source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_00<tab>If Alisaie is discouraged, she betrays no hint of it.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_00<tab>Если Ализе и расстроена, то виду не подаёт.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_01<tab>At the end of the crystalline path, you and the twins arrive at a recreation of a ruined city. Meteion reveals that this world was already devoid of life when she found it, but despite the seeming absence of emotion to bar your way, she claims you will find no path forward. Not to be discouraged, you resolve to ascertain the truth with your own eyes, and split up to explore.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_01<tab>At the end of the crystalline path, you and the twins arrive at a recreation of a ruined city. Meteion reveals that this world was already devoid of life when she found it, but despite the seeming absence of emotion to bar your way, she claims you will find no path forward. Not to be discouraged, you resolve to ascertain the truth with your own eyes, and split up to explore.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_02<tab>You search high and low, but fail to find any forms of life. Given the state in which the city has been left, however, one would think the denizens simply up and vanished. Having seen what there is to be seen, you decide to rejoin Alisaie.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_02<tab>You search high and low, but fail to find any forms of life. Given the state in which the city has been left, however, one would think the denizens simply up and vanished. Having seen what there is to be seen, you decide to rejoin Alisaie.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_03<tab>Alisaie points out a terminating road; if only it continued, the dead sun would seem to be within reach. With your combined findings, you go to seek out Alphinaud to see if he has made any discoveries of his own.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_03<tab>Alisaie points out a terminating road; if only it continued, the dead sun would seem to be within reach. With your combined findings, you go to seek out Alphinaud to see if he has made any discoveries of his own.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_04<tab>As your party gathers to ponder your quandary, Alisaie's musings spark an epiphany within Alphinaud. Convinced that there is indeed someone present who has wished for the ruin amidst which you stand, he leads the way to that very individual─Meteion herself. The familiar, he explains, was horrified by the devastation she found wheresoever she went in the universe, and succumbed to the fear of moving forward. Drawing upon their conviction that hardships are a part of life to be embraced, Alphinaud and Alisaie succeed in breaking down the wall of Meteion's fear, sacrificing themselves to open the way for you. As the last to remain, your steps weigh heavy, but you remind yourself that you are not alone as you set forth for the oppressive darkness of Absolute Horizon. Should you stray from the path, you may begin walking it again from the entrance to the nekropolis.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_04<tab>As your party gathers to ponder your quandary, Alisaie's musings spark an epiphany within Alphinaud. Convinced that there is indeed someone present who has wished for the ruin amidst which you stand, he leads the way to that very individual─Meteion herself. The familiar, he explains, was horrified by the devastation she found wheresoever she went in the universe, and succumbed to the fear of moving forward. Drawing upon their conviction that hardships are a part of life to be embraced, Alphinaud and Alisaie succeed in breaking down the wall of Meteion's fear, sacrificing themselves to open the way for you. As the last to remain, your steps weigh heavy, but you remind yourself that you are not alone as you set forth for the oppressive darkness of Absolute Horizon. Should you stray from the path, you may begin walking it again from the entrance to the nekropolis.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive at Absolute Horizon only to have Meteion reveal that there is no way to reach her nest─for hope cannot deliver you unto hopelessness. To come so near yet be so far, you feel the tendrils of despair begin to grip your heart, but the voices within grant you the strength to carry on. As if resonating with your resolve, the crystal of Azem begins to shine before two familiar forms appear─Emet-Selch and Hythlodaeus, plucked from the Lifestream. Declaring their defiance against the doom Meteion would bring, they draw upon the hopes of your comrades to make for you a new path, one in a form of your choosing. You scarcely have a moment to blink as the barren ground around you transforms into a field of Elpis flowers, white and radiant in hope enduring. Their presence serves to prove that despair no longer holds complete sway in this realm, and thus you are free to summon your comrades back to your side. The blossoms also awaken the memories of Hermes within Meteion, who beseeches you to silence the song of oblivion her sisters sing before fleeing to the dead sun. Their impromptu parts played to perfection, your ancient allies take their leave, bowing out to resume their slumber and entrusting you with the fate of the star─yours and theirs.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive at Absolute Horizon only to have Meteion reveal that there is no way to reach her nest─for hope cannot deliver you unto hopelessness. To come so near yet be so far, you feel the tendrils of despair begin to grip your heart, but the voices within grant you the strength to carry on. As if resonating with your resolve, the crystal of Azem begins to shine before two familiar forms appear─Emet-Selch and Hythlodaeus, plucked from the Lifestream. Declaring their defiance against the doom Meteion would bring, they draw upon the hopes of your comrades to make for you a new path, one in a form of your choosing. You scarcely have a moment to blink as the barren ground around you transforms into a field of Elpis flowers, white and radiant in hope enduring. Their presence serves to prove that despair no longer holds complete sway in this realm, and thus you are free to summon your comrades back to your side. The blossoms also awaken the memories of Hermes within Meteion, who beseeches you to silence the song of oblivion her sisters sing before fleeing to the dead sun. Their impromptu parts played to perfection, your ancient allies take their leave, bowing out to resume their slumber and entrusting you with the fate of the star─yours and theirs.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_06<tab>With the way to Meteion's nest open and your comrades beside you once more, you stand ready to finish your task. To the Endsinger, you must deliver the answer of all lives of Etheirys, and see this tale to a triumphant conclusion.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SEQ_06<tab>With the way to Meteion's nest open and your comrades beside you once more, you stand ready to finish your task. To the Endsinger, you must deliver the answer of all lives of Etheirys, and see this tale to a triumphant conclusion.

TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_00<tab>Explore the nekropolis.
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_03<tab>Make your way to Absolute Horizon.
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>One way or another, we must find the way forward. Let us make a thorough search of the city.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Тем или иным способом мы обязаны отыскать путь вперёд. Предлагаю внимательно обыскать город.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>Whatever Meteion may have said, we should confirm it with our own eyes. We need to have a look around.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>Что бы там ни говорила Метион, мы должны сами убедиться. Осмотримся.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>Indeed. At the very least, it doesn't appear to be a sprawling place like those before. If we split up, it shouldn't take too long to cover the area.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>Ага. По крайней мере это не столь же обширная и запутанная зона, как прежде. Если разделимся, быстро покроем территорию.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>The isle's edge already, and there only appears to be this park here. How it must have bustled with life once upon a time...
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>Вот и край острова, а тут только это дерево. Должно быть, когда-то здесь кипела жизнь...

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>I'm trying to see if there are ways to reach the nearby isles. Just in case Meteion was bluffing...
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>Я пытаюсь понять, нет ли здесь способов добраться до ближайших островов. Метион могла и блефовать.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>There doesn't seem to be anyone here. Perhaps you could try calling out...
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_Q1_000_031<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_A1_000_032<tab>Hello!
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_A1_000_033<tab>Is anyone here?
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>If anyone has heard you, they do not respond.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Даже если кто-то вас слышал, они не торопятся отвечать.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>The object resembles a tree, and appears to have been fashioned from a stone-like material.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>Объект напоминает дерево, правда сделано оно, судя по всему, из материала, похожего на камень.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Erected in place of an actual tree...or to serve some other purpose, perhaps. Regardless, there is no one left to explain. To tell the story...
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Изваяние на месте настоящего дерева... либо оно предназначено для какой-то неведомой вам цели. Не то чтобы вокруг вас была целая толпа желающих пояснить...

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_045<tab>Were it not for the thick layer of dust, one could imagine someone drinking from these cups but moments ago...
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_045<tab>Если бы не толстый слой пыли, могло бы сложиться ощущение, будто из этих кружек минуту назад кто-то пил.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>This place is reminiscent of a bar, but neither patrons nor staff are anywhere to be seen.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>Место напоминает бар, но ни клиентов, ни персонала не видно.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Egg-shaped containers line the shelves, with a loose few sitting on the counter. Vessels for the beverages, in all likelihood.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>На полках покоятся контейнеры в виде яиц, подобные же стоят на стойке. Судя по всему, это такие ёмкости для напитков.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>A venue bustling with activity until it was not...
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>Though set slightly off the ground, this appears to be a door, while the objects to the left could be letter boxes.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>Панель немного приподнята над землёй - наверняка это дверь. Объекты слева - урны для мусора.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>The door is rusted shut, and the film of dust all over suggests no one has come through in a long, long time...
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Дверь намертво заржавела и не подаётся, но толстый слой пыли на ручке подсказывает, что здесь давным-давно никто не проходил...

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>In the distance, you glimpse Alisaie picking her way through the ruins, but otherwise spy no signs of life.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>На расстоянии вы замечаете Ализе, обследующую руины. Больше никаких признаков жизни.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_Q2_000_061<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_A2_000_062<tab>If anyone can hear me, say something!
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_064<tab>Your call echoes faintly before being swallowed by the silence...
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_064<tab>Ваш крик разносится слабым эхом, а после наступает всё та же гробовая тишина.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>You strain your ears to catch something─anything─but hear not so much as the chirping of an insect...
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>Вы напрягаете слух, пытаясь что-нибудь услышать - всё что угодно - но даже таких привычных звуков как сверчки или завывание ветра здесь нет.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, take a look at this. If the road was a little longer, we could take it to just beneath the dead sun.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, погляди-ка. Если бы дорога здесь продолжалась, она привела бы нас к подножию мёртвого солнца.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_071<tab>But I suppose this is where the reconstruction ends...
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_072<tab>How about you? Did you find anything of interest?
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_072<tab>Ну а ты? Удалось найти что-нибудь интересное?

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_073<tab>I see. I noticed the same things─cups left upon tables, chairs out of place... I don't know what happened here, but I do know I don't want to be alone anymore...
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_073<tab>Да, да. Я тоже заметила странности - чашки на столах, стулья выдвинуты... Не знаю, что тут произошло. Это место почти ощутимо давит своим одиночеством...

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_074<tab>We've searched enough for now. Let's find Alphinaud and compare what we've learned.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_074<tab>Ладно, больше мы тут ничего не отыщем. Вернёмся к Альфино и сопоставим информацию.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_Q3_000_080<tab>Continue with the main scenario quest?
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_090<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)If you need a push, I'll be right there behind you.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_090<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)Если надо будет тебя подтолкнуть, я уже буду за твоей спиной.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_095<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)Do not despair! You are not without allies.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_095<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)Не отчаивайся! Ты не <var 08 E905 ((лишена)) ((лишён)) /var> союзников.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_100<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)What we have sown in blood, we have reaped in suffering, and it cannot go on.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_100<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)...Но мы сеяли лишь кровь, а урожаем нашим стало страдание. Так не может продолжаться.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_105<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)Upon the souls of they who have sacrificed themselves to pave the way for peace, we will never abandon our cause.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_105<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)Именем всех тех, кто пожертвовал своими душами, чтобы проложить путь к миру — мы не отступим от цели.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_110<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)While it is true that man succumbs all too often to anger and avarice, he may yet overcome his baser instincts through the forming of bonds with others.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_110<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)Верно, человеку свойственно поддаваться гневу и алчности, но он может преодолеть эти низменные инстинкты и образовать связи с остальными, формируя общества, помогая друг другу.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_115<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)Such victories are rarely won without sacrifice. But the prize is worth the price.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_115<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)...Подобные победы редко удаётся одержать без жертв. На этот раз игра стоила свеч.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_120<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)And we for our part are glad indeed to be able to welcome friends both old and new...
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_120<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)А мы же всегда готовы принять как старых, так и новых друзей...

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_125<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)Save your tears for the morrow. You may be sure we will have ample cause to shed them, be they for joy or despair.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_125<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)Храни слёзы для печали. Уверяю, вскоре причин пролить их будет достаточно, будь то от радости или отчаяния.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_130<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)From tragedy and sacrifice we rise to greet a new dawn.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_130<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)Вчера трагедия и жертвы, а сегодня новый рассвет.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_135<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)A future shaped by the choices we made, in ways we could never have foreseen.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_135<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)...Будущее, которое мы были вольны выбирать себе сами; способами, которых мы тогда ещё не знали.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_140<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)Yet miracles do happen. So let us pray, and will our friends home.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_140<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)Но чудеса случаются. Остаётся молиться, чтобы наши друзья добрались домой.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_145<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)I won't stop praying until I know they're safe.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_145<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)Я не прекращу молиться, пока они не окажутся в безопасности.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_150<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)Strong art thou, mortal.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_150<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)Сила в тебе велика, смертн<var 08 E905 ((ая)) ((ый)) /var>...

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_155<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)Look to the light within, that you may continue to serve as a beacon to others.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_155<tab>(-Голос из Прошлого-)...Вместо того вглядись в свет внутри себя — так ты продолжишь служить маяком для других.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_PASSER_000_160<tab>(-Voice from the Past-)Let's finish this.
TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_170<tab>I don't think I ever knew what to say to the man. In retrospect, it always felt like the wrong thing...
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_170<tab>Я и не знала, что ему сказать. Хотя, если честно, даже сейчас любые слова кажутся незначительными...

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_171<tab>But the past notwithstanding, he came to your aid in your moment of need.
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_171<tab>Но прошлое прошлым, он пришёл тебе помочь в отчаянный момент.

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_172<tab>We are here, and we will not squander this chance he has given us!
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_172<tab>Ну вот и мы. Мы не упустим подаренный нам шанс!

source: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_173<tab>We will see this tale to a triumphant conclusion, and bid the final curtain fall!
target: TEXT_AKTKMG114_04463_ALISAIE_000_173<tab>We will see this tale to a triumphant conclusion, and bid the final curtain fall!
